sn22.153:1.2: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.3: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn22.153:1.5: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.6: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.153:1.10: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa, evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.11: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.153:1.15: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.153:1.17: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn22.153:1.18: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn22.153:1.25: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.153:1.27: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn22.153:1.28: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
